name: wp-client-reference-bkj
description: It's common practice for digital agencies to build a WordPress site/theme then simply hand it off to the client for day-to-day updating. The developers work hard to strike a balance between replicating the designer's vision and making the theme easy for the client to use. As the design becomes more complex the developer faces questions: Will the client remember to wrap this in a `<blockquote>`? Can we count on the content manager remembering to add `class="btn"` to that link?
